content.title: Inspire
content.content: CECSC's mission is to inspire students within the School of Engineering and Applied Science. Engineering is about both passion and creation.

content.title: Re-Think
content.content: Helping to shape the way students think about the field of engineering and obstacles that Miami students are helping to solve.

content.title: Imagine
content.content: Miami's students are doing amazing things in the field of research, and Miami University want to see their work to shine and inspire others to go beyond their limits.

content.title: Unite
content.content: Within just the past semester alone, CECSC has become a well-known organization within the school and has brought students together in a way that has never been done before.
